about_us.title: The Wheeler family grows hemp and herbs regeneratively.
about_us.desc: Learn about RavenRidge Family Farm, managed by the Wheeler family, and get an introduction to regenerative agriculture and our CBD products.

faqs.title: Quality information about hemp, CBD and our products.
faqs.desc: Learn about what makes our products unique, why you can be certain of their quality and whatever else interesting we are allowed to share.

privacy_policy.title: Our privacy policy for website visitors and customers.
privacy_policy.desc: See how we treat visitor and customer data, and what to be aware of when you use this website.

shipping_and_returns.title: Our shipping and returns policy for CBD products.
shipping_and_returns.desc: The cost of priority USPS shipping anywhere in the United States is included in the price of all products, and we will accept returns within ten days of purchase.

terms_and_conditions.title: The terms and conditions for using this website.
terms_and_conditions.desc: Potential age restrictions and general risks surrounding the use of hemp and herbal products are outlined here. Be informed.

third_party_testing.title: Our third party product testing pledge.
third_party_testing.desc: We believe in full transparency with our product testing, and this page show you how to find our product tests easily.

trifold2020.title: Landing page for folks who have seen our 2020 brochure.
trifold2020.desc: Thanks for visiting to learn more about our whole plant extract cbd products, and to buy sublingual oil or topical salve.

newsletter_signup.title: Landing page for folks to sign up for our newsletter.
newsletter_signup.desc: Thanks for visiting. To learn more about our cbd products and regenerative practices, sign up for our newsletter.

card.title: Landing page for folks who found one of our business cards.
card.desc: Thanks for visiting. To learn more about our whole plant extract cbd products, sign up for our newsletter. Or to buy CBD products, visit the products page.

acresusa.title: Thanks, ACRES readers, for spreading the good word!
acresusa.desc: Thanks for visiting. To learn more about our regenerative practices and hemp-derived CBD products, sign up for our newsletter. Or to buy CBD products, visit the products page.

triadnatural.title: Thanks, Triad Natural community, for supporting our work!
